On Wed, 23 Jul 2003 20:41:39=
 -0000, jxingtang wrote:

>How do I verify that command line arguments are
=
>extracted corrctly to the right private member variables?

Write a method
=
public String getParamValue(String paramName, String[] args) and write
test=
s for this method.

Your private members can then be initialized with
priva=
te int myPrivateInteger =3D getParamValues("port", prgArgs); and
there will=
 be no need to access private members.

Another approach might be the use o=
f test-cases defined as inner
classes.
